Stanford University, Office of Undergraduate Admissions, Records
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Stanford University. Office of Undergraduate Admissions.

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Office of Undergraduate Admissions, records
did.abstract: General office files containing correspondence, memoranda, policies, surveys, reports, speeches, minutes, articles, and other records pertaining to policies and procedures, academic planning, housing, recruitment, financial aid, legislation, and other issues. Persons represented in the files include deans Fred A. Hargadon and Jean H. Fetter; assistant provost Raymond F. Bacchetti; and G. Robert Hamrdla of the undergraduate studies office.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted: for more information, contact the University Archivist.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford University, Office of Undergraduate Admissions, Records (SC0407). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: General office files containing correspondence, memoranda, policies, surveys, reports, speeches, minutes, articles, and other records pertaining to policies and procedures, academic planning, housing, recruitment, financial aid, legislation, and other issues. Persons represented in the files include deans Fred A. Hargadon and Jean H. Fetter; assistant provost Raymond F. Bacchetti; and G. Robert Hamrdla of the undergraduate studies office.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.corpname: Stanford University. Office of Undergraduate Admissions.
controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges--Admission.
